definition: beginning to develop, reproduction of some unicellular organisms (such as yeasts) by growth and specialization followed by the separation by constriction of a part of the parent
details:
adjective
- beginning to develop
= example: beginning to develop
= synonyms: inchoative
noun
- reproduction of some unicellular organisms (such as yeasts) by growth and specialization followed by the separation by constriction of a part of the parent
